title: Boutique Palatial Retreat in the Pyrenees with Outdoor Pool & Traditional Catalan Dining
description:
Nestled in a valley where the Pyrenees pierce the sky, this stunning 1910 mansion is adorned with ornate turrets, romantic balconies and exquisitely restored rooms. Inside, original art nouveau details shine, including decorative fireplaces, polished wooden floors and sweeping floor-to-ceiling windows with views of the three-hectare garden. 

The sparkling pool offers the ultimate space for relaxation, while the TR 1910 restaurant transforms local ingredients from the Cerdanya Valley into delicacies like butifarra (Catalan sausage) and salmorejo with lobster. Your furry friends are also more than welcome at this pet-friendly haven.

title: Romantic Spain Palatial Retreat Overlooking the Catalan Pyrenees Mountains
description: Escape to the magical Spanish countryside for a serene stay within the wildly beautiful, historical Serras Torre del Remei. Let the magnificent mountainous surrounds take your breath away as you explore the idyllic three-hectare garden and relax in the contemporary yet classic interiors of this 1910 modernist palace. Paddle around the sparking pool, sip on creative cocktails at Botanic Bar, or indulge in elevated gastronomic experiences at Blanca Restaurant, where local produce reigns supreme.
